laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Subsequent testing showed undetectable anti-GAD antibody.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Opening pressure of 40 cm H2O, white blood cell count of 23, glucose 40, and protein 193 mg/dL.
Showed epileptiform activity in the right mid-temporal cortex.
Blood glucose of 90 mg/dL (normal), Hgb A1C 5.3% (normal), undetectable anti-GAD antibody.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial testing showed high blood glucose and Hgb A1c.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Electrophysiologic testing (right median and ulnar nerves)
laboratory_examinations.findings: Right median CMAP 2.3 mV (low) and right ulnar 3.4 mV (low). Following exercise, right ulnar CMAP increased to 6.8 mV.
17% decrement in CMAP amplitude at 3 Hz, 164% amplitude increment at 50 Hz.
